snippet.title: Mechabellum Official Trailer 2025
snippet.description:
Mechabellum is an infinitely replayable tactical auto-battler, developed by Game River and published by Dreamhaven, in which you command a mech army while competing against thousands of players worldwide.

Become a Commander: 
Steam Store: https://bit.ly/433ZYyv
Discord: https://discord.gg/T4AR3RyHgU
Twitter/X: https://bit.ly/40FYg3m
